archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Manage Party Agreement Variation
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: Manage changes to the commercial terms of an agreement during its term.

properties.value: Manage Party Agreement Variation manages changes to the terms/conditions of an agreement during its term of agreement. Variations can occur to the commercial terms themselves, (such as to prices, or to the technical, functional and operational specifications on which the agreement was based. In addition, changes can occur to the list of items (modification, expansion or reduction) within the agreement upon which processes can place orders. Manage all activities which result in a joint agreement to vary the terms of the original negotiated agreement. In addition, manage any agreements between the enterprise and the party of â€œwithin agreementâ€� product volumes, their specification, pricing and delivery timetable.
